column2: A group of superheroes, including Iron Man, Thor, Captain America, and the Hulk, team up to save the world from an alien invasion.
A theme park showcasing cloned dinosaurs suffers a major security breakdown and chaos ensues.
In the mid-22nd century, humans colonize a distant moon called Pandora, where they clash with the native Na'vi population.

column1: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
column2: A hobbit named Frodo must carry a powerful ring to Mount Doom to destroy it before it falls into the hands of the dark lord Sauron.
Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology.
A slow-witted but kind-hearted and athletically-talented man.
A group of astronauts travel through a wormhole near Saturn in search of a new habitable planet for humanity.
A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and joins a group of rebels to fight against sentient machines.
A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague Gotham City, but faces a formidable foe in the Joker.
A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
A young lion prince must navigate the challenges of growing up and reclaim his rightful place as the king of the Pride Lands.
A young boy befriends a stranded alien and helps him find a way to return to his home planet.
Scottish warrior William Wallace leads a revolt against the oppressive English rule during the First War of Scottish Independence.
A teenager travels back in time with the help of an eccentric scientist and must make sure his parents meet and fall in love.

column1: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
column2: Archaeologist Indiana Jones races against Nazis to find the Ark of the Covenant, which is said to grant divine power.
In a world where people can manipulate the elements, a young boy with the power to control all four elements must bring balance to the world.
An FBI agent seeks the help of a brilliant but insane serial killer to catch another serial killer on the loose.
A man discovers that his entire life is a reality TV show and decides to break free from his controlled world.
The story of the creation of the social networking website Facebook and the legal battles that follow.
A prison guard forms an unusual bond with a death row inmate who possesses mysterious healing powers.
A New York cop battles a group of terrorists who have taken hostages in a Los Angeles skyscraper during a Christmas party.
An insomniac office worker and a soap salesman form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more dangerous.
A young boy who can communicate with the dead is asked to help a troubled spirit with unfinished business.
Two bounty hunters with different motives team up to track down a notorious outlaw and claim the reward.
Two magicians engage in a bitter rivalry as they try to outperform each other with their greatest illusions.
A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth seeking their maker.
An undercover cop and a mole in the police force attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.
A group of Jewish U.S. soldiers plan to assassinate Nazi leaders during World War II.
Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
